description:
Main activity status

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
63400 EU statistics on income and living conditions

Definition:
Activity status which applied over a period of more than six
months in the income reference year. In some cases, the main
activity status cannot be determined. Consequently, the
total of the numbers of cases underlying the items "persons
in employment" and "persons not in employment" does not add
up to 100%; it is lower than the relevant number of cases in
the item "Total".


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Main activity status
